content: Y-yes, this is a cutscene mah~

Now that the fruits have grown,
let's enjoy the joy of harvest together!
C-come on, let's pick some fruits together!

(test) L-look here! The fruits have grown so big,
And some have such peculiar shapes too!
I'll make an offering of you all, and we'll take a nice photo together~!

Since we're farming for the residents,
how about we give them all the fruit after harvest?
What do you think mah~?
